thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-TDC Reports 18 Pct ‍EBITDA Decrease In Business In Q4 Yoy

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-TDC Reports 18 Pct ‍EBITDA Decrease In Business In Q4 Yoy
text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Tdc:
* : TDC : EBITDA STABILISATION ACHIEVED IN 2017 * ‍ORGANIC EBITDA DECLINE OF 1.3% AND REPORTED EBITDA DECLINE OF 4.8% IN Q4 YOY​
* FOR 2018 EXPECT TO DELIVER FLAT TO SLIGHTLY GROWING ORGANIC EBITDA, STABLE TO GROWING CASH FLOWS
* ‍EBITDA DECREASE OF 18.8% IN BUSINESS IN Q4 YOY, WHICH IS WORSE THAN YTD TREND MAINLY DUE TO DIFFERENT TIMING​
* LOSS OF 17K TV CUSTOMERS IN DENMARK IN Q4 IN LINE WITH MARKET DEVELOPMENT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
